item.title: Developing android app the fun way
item.description: Android is the buzz word right now. This is a great time for developers and users alike. But we still have the distinction of “developers” and “end users”. That difference is set to blur now. The pre-requisite for writing an android application was Knowledge of the Java programming language. With the introduction of Android Scripting Engine (ASE), Python developers too can join the fun. But still we have the user/developer distinction.

item.title: In-house Audio Streaming
item.description: Lots of users have gigabytes of music in their personal computer, but every time when we want to listen to music on our portable device, we need to copy selectively some songs to the device and then listen. You can listen to all the songs from your PC itself. But what if your girl friend wants to watch videos and you have only one computer in your house? Now stop fighting, leave the computer with you girl friend and start your music stream to connect from your Android or any mobile with streaming audio playback support.
